senses.sense_definition: Partially unable to speak or having imperfectly developed speech.

examples.text: The <w>semimute</w> patient struggled to communicate his needs to the nurse.
After the accident, he remained in a <w>semimute</w> condition for several months.

senses.sense_definition: A person who is partially unable to speak or has imperfect speech.

examples.text: The historical records listed several <w>semimutes</w> among the hospital residents.
Speech therapy can sometimes help a <w>semimute</w> regain some vocal abilities.
